Hero.description: Ghostbyte is a software development studio specializing in creating exceptional digital experiences for businesses and brands.

Projects.description: From mobile apps to web platforms — see what we've been building.
Projects.pixelix_description: A feature-rich mobile application with many cool features.
Projects.daily_tasks_description: A minimalist app that helps you prioritize your tasks each day using the Ivy Lee Method for better focus and productivity.
Projects.socialfolio_description: A simple, open-source way to share your socials in one place.
Projects.library_description: A collection of many useful websites and tools. They are sorted by category and include some tags to quickly find the right one for your needs.

Team.title: Who We Are
Team.description: Ghostbyte is a small but dedicated team of developers passionate about creating innovative and high-quality digital experiences.
Team.daniel_description: Daniel is a developer passionate about crafting innovative and user-friendly software solutions.
Team.emanuel_description: Emanuel brings expertise in development and problem-solving, ensuring high-quality and efficient applications at Ghostbyte.

Contact.title: Get in touch
Contact.description: Have a project in mind? Send us a message and let's create something amazing together.

Services.title: Services
Services.description: We offer a comprehensive range of software development services to help your business succeed.
Services.mobile_development_description: We build native and cross-platform mobile applications for iOS and Android that deliver exceptional user experiences.
Services.web_development_description: From simple websites to complex web applications, we create responsive and performant web solutions.
Services.seo_description: We optimize your website for search engines to improve visibility, increase traffic, and help your audience find you organically.
Services.ui_ux_design_description: We create intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces that enhance user experience and engagement.
Services.maintainance_support_description: We provide ongoing maintenance and support services to ensure your software continues to perform optimally.

Imprint.title: Imprint
Imprint.disclaimer_content: The information contained on this website is for general information purposes only. Ghostbyte GesbR does not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or usefulness of any information on this site.
Imprint.liability_content: This website may contain links to external websites. Ghostbyte GesbR has no control over the content of external websites and is not responsible for them.

Meta.title: Ghostbyte – Web & App Development Studio in Austria
Meta.description: Ghostbyte is your partner for modern web & app development. We create custom software solutions with a focus on design, performance, and usability.
